Posts.Content: My mom had breast cancer 4 years ago. Her tumor was 2.1cm, she was node negative. However, her cancer had her-2(3+), ki67+, p53+ ... all bad prognosis. I am always worried about cancer coming back. Some people have told me that when BC is her-2(+3) it always come back, sooner or later. I am very afraid about this horrible disease. Please, somebody help me here...
Posts.Title: Her-2, Ki67, P53...

Posts.Content: Dear Carole, a lot of things matter in BC. The tumor size, the nodes, and if it has metastases. Her-2 is only a additional factor. My mom had BC 4 years ago, and although I am afraid cancer comes back, she is doing just fine right now. I think you have to give more details about your BC so I can try helpping you. Warm Regards, Leo.
Posts.Title: Her2 Positive
